name: Google Maps
description: Search places, get directions, calculate distances, and geocode addresses.

credentials.name: api_key
credentials.label: Google Maps API Key
credentials.description: API key from Google Cloud Console with Maps APIs enabled

functions.name: places_search
functions.description: Search for places by text query. Returns a list of matching places with names, addresses, and ratings.

query.description: Text search query (e.g. 'coffee shops in Portland', 'best pizza near Times Square').

location.description: Optional center point as 'latitude,longitude' to bias results (e.g. '45.5152,-122.6784').

radius.description: Search radius in meters around the location. Defaults to 5000. Max 50000.

type.description: Filter by place type (e.g. 'restaurant', 'cafe', 'hospital', 'gas_station'). See Google Place Types.

functions.name: place_details
functions.description: Get detailed information about a specific place including hours, phone, website, and reviews.

placeId.description: The Google Place ID (returned from places_search or places_nearby results).

functions.name: places_nearby
functions.description: Find places near a specific location. Good for 'what's nearby' queries with type filters.

radius.description: Search radius in meters. Defaults to 1500. Max 50000.

functions.name: directions
functions.description: Get directions between two points including route steps, distance, and duration.

departure_time.description: Departure time as ISO 8601 string or 'now'. Needed for transit directions and traffic estimates.

alternatives.description: If true, return multiple route alternatives. Defaults to false.

functions.name: distance_matrix
functions.description: Get travel time and distance for multiple origin-destination pairs. Useful for comparing options.

origins.description: List of origin addresses or 'latitude,longitude' strings.

destinations.description: List of destination addresses or 'latitude,longitude' strings.

functions.name: geocode
functions.description: Convert an address to geographic coordinates (latitude/longitude).

address.description: The address to geocode (e.g. '1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA').

functions.name: reverse_geocode
functions.description: Convert geographic coordinates to a human-readable address.

functions.name: place_autocomplete
functions.description: Get place name predictions from partial text input. Use to disambiguate vague place references.

input.description: Partial place name or address to autocomplete.

radius.description: Bias radius in meters around the location.
